attributes.action:
Parliament is deadlocked.
Hold a General Election now!
attributes.additional_details:
The current Parliament is a Zombie Parliament.
We call upon all MPs to stop their political games.
We, the people, demand a General Election so we can elect politicians who will truly reflect our views on issues of national importance.
attributes.background:
Parliament is currently deadlocked.
Politicians are playing political games. 
It is time to break the deadlock. 
Hold a General election now!
